As per this Circular; a8 soon a8 the decision of DRB or the Arbitral Tribunal or the Court is received, the same has to be placed before the concerned Member, who will immediately form a Committee of 3 GMs to process the matter and submit recommendations for arriving at final decision either by the concerned Member or the Executive Committee 2 After scrutiny of several cage8 of such nature, the Competent Authority has decided that the Arbitral Award' passed by majority of the Arbitrators which has a dissenting note of one of the Arbitrators, the recommendations of 3 GMs Committee need not be referred to the Executive Committee for taking decision on challenging of the Arbitral Award; Such Arbitral Awards can be   challenged with the   approval of the concerned Member: If; however, the Member feels that the award should be accepted, the matter may be placed before the Executive Committee well within the   period of limitation_ 3 This issues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI ?v (VKSharmd) Chief General Manager (LA & Coord ) To: All officers and employees of HQROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices NHAI
